Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back Tasmania 9 Day Guided Cycling Tour Tasmania - Launceston to Hobart 8 Nights • Guided cycling tour • Sightseeing • Select Meals Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Experience the unspoilt beauty of Tasmania’s east coast on this fully guided cycling adventure from Launceston to Hobart, with highlights including Freycinet National Park, Wineglass Bay, wineries, oyster farms, and wildlife sanctuaries. Recognised globally for its pristine environment and exceptional food and wine, Tasmania continues to earn accolades as a top travel destination. This tour blends scenic cycling with gourmet experiences for an unforgettable journey. This tour is intermediate-to-challenging and features six days of cycling, beginning with a gentle ride on the North East Rail Trail. The following days cover scenic coastal roads, with flexible daily distances and full vehicle support throughout. E-bikes (available for hire or BYO) make the tour accessible to most riders. A well-timed rest day includes a two-night stay in stunning Freycinet National Park. View more View less 8 nights + guided cycling tour + select meals + sightseeing from $ 6079 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 30 Nov 25 or unless sold out prior Your inclusions 8 nights accommodation (4 star or equivalent), including 2 nights accommodation at the renowned Freycinet Lodge Select Meals including : 8 breakfasts, 3 lunches & 5 restaurant dinners Freycinet National Park hike with gourmet lunch & local guide Wine tastings at some of Tasmania's best vineyards Experienced, qualified ride with guide throughout Support vehicle and driver following at all times Arrival and departure transfers (start and end dates of tour only) Transport to MONA on last day (optional and at additional cost if required) Souvenir lightweight t-shirt, environmentally friendly water bottle, luggage tags BYO bike or bike hire (including e-bike) is available at an additional cost Flights are Additional Price from From $6079 per person share twin Departures: 04 Jan, 14 Mar & 11 Apr 26 Terms & Conditions Sales until 30 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 17 Sep 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability. Prices are per person share twin. Flights are additional. Full payment may be required at the time of booking, cancellation fees apply, ask your House of Travel consultant for full terms and conditions. Payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • A peak season supplement applies from 1 March to 31 May each year to cover increased accommodation costs. Additionally, a surcharge may apply apply for any tours booked over a long weekend or any Australian Public Holiday including Easter. Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details. HOT CODE: CMPTAS2526 9 Day Guided Cycling Tour Tasmania- Launceston to Hobart Itinerary Day 1 : Arrive to Launceston Arrive Launceston. Transfers included. Meet your guide and fellow travellers. Group dinner (always fun) overnight in 4 star property in Launceston. Day 2: Launceston to Scottsdale A gentle intro ride on the North East Tas Rail Trail, optional visit stunning Bridestowe lavender farm (seasonal). Overnight in Scottsdale. Cycling distance 35kms (easy) Day 3: Explore St Helens Morning bus transfer to start of ride. Visit beautiful Lilydale Falls, and local dairy farm (cheese tasting optional) then riding to beachside town St Helens. Seaside group dinner. Overnight St Helens. Cycling distance 40kms Day 4: Arrival to Bicherno Stunning coastal riding to Bicherno. Beachside picnic lunch. Optional wine tasting. Local fish and chips a treat. Cycling distance 50kms Day 5: Coles Bay/ Freycint Park Ride to Coles Bay/Freycinet Park. Wine tasting + lunch at stunning Devils Corner Winery. Check in to luxury Freycinet Lodge and group dinner. A special day! Cycling distance 55kms Day 6: Wineglass Bay A rest day from cycling as we enjoy a memorable guided hike to Wineglass Bay. Boat transfer return gives amazing views. Free evening. Overnight in luxury Freycinet Lodge Day 7: Tribunna or Coal River (dependant on season) Ride to Triabunna. Amazing views of Maria Island. Dinner & overnight Triabunna. Cycling distance 55kms Day 8: Hobart Ride to Hobart via quiet and scenic back country roads + stop in historic Richmond & winery lunch to celebrate end of ride. Final fun group dinner with awards and overnight in Hobart. Cycling distance 25kms. Day 9: Farewell After breakfast, bid your sad farewells to guides and fellow travellers as the tour concludes. Transfers are available.
